title: Orchids of Victoria
brief_description: Pictures many different varieties of orchids found growing wild in widely scattered parts of Victoria. Notes the differences among orchids and gives the common and botanical names as well as basic information about each variety.
description: Pictures many different varieties of orchids found growing wild in widely scattered parts of Victoria. Notes the differences among orchids and gives the common and botanical names as well as basic information about each variety.
